info.title: Neema Gospel Choir APIs
info.description:
This is the API documentation for the Neema Gospel Choir system. 
 *         It provides access to user authentication, donations, donation categories, 
 *         profiles, and other resources.

get.summary: Get all addresses for authenticated user
Get addresses for a specific user

403.description: Unauthorized to view addresses for this user

post.summary: Set a default address for a user

403.description: Unauthorized to modify addresses for this user

404.description: Address not found for this user

post.description: Login using email or phone number
Verify user OTP and activate account
Resend OTP to email or phone

200.description: User's cart with items and total

422.description: Cannot delete country with associated users

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for country name, code, or dial code

get.summary: Get simple list of countries for dropdowns
Get users from a specific country

200.description: List of donations for the campaign

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for event title or location

picture.description: Music cover image (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF, max 2MB)

audio_file.description: Audio file (MP3, WAV, OGG, M4A, FLAC, max 50MB)

featured_image.description: Featured image (JPEG, PNG, JPG, GIF, max 2MB)

400.description: Cart is empty or validation errors

post.description: Confirm ticket payment (webhook or manual confirmation)

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Search term for product name or description

400.description: Cannot delete attribute value in use

profile_picture.description: Image file (jpeg, png, jpg, gif, webp, max 5MB)

get.summary: Get ticket types for an event

post.summary: Create a new ticket type for an event

400.description: Cannot cancel order that is already processed

get.summary: Get ticket order by payment reference

parameters.name: paymentRef
parameters.description: Payment reference of the ticket order

description.example: Updated VIP access with premium seating

400.description: Validation errors or cannot reduce quantity below sold tickets
Cannot delete ticket type with existing paid orders

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query for user name, email, or phone

422.description: Validation errors or user already has this role
User does not have this role

bearerAuth.description:
Use the JWT token obtained from the login endpoint. 
 *         Example: 'Bearer {token}'

tags.name: Product Management
tags.description: APIs for managing products, categories, variants, and attributes
